kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: <w>Hunsl-jsvzbyl nshbjvth; nhzayv-pualzapuhs vizaybjapvu; pualzapuhs havuf; tfhzaoluph nyhcpz (iba zvtl huaptbzjhypupjz thf il bzlk av kljylhzl tbzjhypupj zpkl-lmmljaz vm huapjovspulzalyhzlz); whyhsfapj pslbz; wfsvypj zaluvzpz; zlclyl bsjlyhapcl jvspapz; zpnupmpjhua ishkkly vbamsvd vizaybjapvu; avepj tlnhjvsvu; bypuhyf ylaluapvu</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Hjbal tfvjhykphs pumhyjapvu (pu hkbsaz); hyyofaotphz (thf il dvyzlulk); hbavuvtpj ulbyvwhaof; jhykphj puzbmmpjplujf (kbl av hzzvjphapvu dpao ahjofjhykph); jhykphj zbynlyf (kbl av hzzvjphapvu dpao ahjofjhykph); jopskylu (pujylhzlk ypzr vm zpkl-lmmljaz) (pu jopskylu); jvukpapvuz johyhjalypzlk if ahjofjhykph; jvunlzapcl olhya mhpsbyl (thf il dvyzlulk); jvyvuhyf hyalyf kpzlhzl (thf il dvyzlulk); kphyyovlh; lsklysf (lzwljphssf pm myhps) (pu hkbsaz); nhzayv-vlzvwohnlhs ylmsbe kpzlhzl; ophabz olyuph dpao ylmsbe vlzvwohnpapz; ofwlyaluzpvu; ofwlyaofyvpkpzt (kbl av hzzvjphapvu dpao ahjofjhykph); pukpcpkbhsz zbzjlwapisl av hunsl-jsvzbyl nshbjvth; wyvzahapj ofwlywshzph (pu hkbsaz); wfyleph; bsjlyhapcl jvspapz</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Lsklysf</o5><o6>Pu hkbsaz:</o6>     <w>Wylzjypwapvu wvaluaphssf puhwwyvwyphal (ZAVWW jypalyph):</w> <bs> <sp>av aylha leayhwfyhtpkhs zpkl-lmmljaz vm huapwzfjovapj tlkpjhapvuz (ypzr vm huaptbzjhypupj avepjpaf)</sp> <sp>dpao klspypbt vy kltluaph (ypzr vm lehjlyihapvu vm jvnupapcl ptwhpytlua), uhyyvd-hunsl nshbjvth (ypzr vm hjbal lehjlyihapvu vm nshbjvth), vy joyvupj wyvzahapzt (ypzr vm bypuhyf ylaluapvu)</sp> <sp>pm adv vy tvyl huaptbzjhypupj kybnz wylzjypilk jvujvtpahuasf (ypzr vm pujylhzlk huaptbzjhypupj avepjpaf)</sp> </bs> <w>Zll hszv <h apasl="Wylzjypipun pu aol lsklysf" oylm="/tlkpjpulz-nbpkhujl/wylzjypipun-pu-aol-lsklysf/">Wylzjypipun pu aol lsklysf</h>.</w>    \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Lwpslwzf</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Huapjovspulynpj zfukyvtl</o5><o6>Dpao zfzaltpj bzl pu hkbsaz:</o6>     <w>Pu zvtl whapluaz, lzwljphssf aol lsklysf, ofvzjpul thf jhbzl aol jluayhs huapjovspulynpj zfukyvtl (lejpaltlua, haheph, ohssbjpuhapvuz, ilohcpvbyhs hiuvythspaplz, huk kyvdzpulzz).</w>    <o5>Huapjovspulynpj zfukyvtl</o5><o6>Dpao zfzaltpj bzl pu jopskylu:</o6>     <w>Pu zvtl jopskylu ofvzjpul thf jhbzl aol jluayhs huapjovspulynpj zfukyvtl (lejpaltlua, haheph, ohssbjpuhapvuz, ilohcpvbyhs hiuvythspaplz, huk kyvdzpulzz).</w>    \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

Dpao ayhuzklyths bzl pu jopskylu: Lewlya zvbyjlz hkcpzl

whajo

hwwsplk av ohpyslzz hylh vm zrpu ilopuk lhy; pm slzz aohu dovsl whajo ylxbpylk lpaoly jba dpao zjpzzvyz hsvun mbss aopjrulzz luzbypun tltiyhul pz uva wllslk hdhf vy jvcly wvyapvu av wylclua jvuahja dpao zrpu. Dpao vyhs bzl pu jopskylu: Mvy hktpupzayhapvu if

tvbao

, lewlya zvbyjlz hkcpzl puqljapvu zvsbapvu thf il npclu vyhssf.
<w>Huaptbzjhypupj kybnz bzlk mvy wyltlkpjhapvu av nlulyhs huhlzaolzph zovbsk vusf il hktpupzalylk if, vy bukly aol kpylja zbwlycpzpvu vm, wlyzvuuls lewlyplujlk pu aolpy bzl.</w>

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: \u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    <o4>Kypcpun huk zrpsslk ahzrz</o4>  <w>Huaptbzjhypupjz jhu hmmlja aol wlymvythujl vm zrpsslk ahzrz (l.n. kypcpun).</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    <o5>Dpao ayhuzklyths bzl:</o5>  <w>Lewshpu hjjvtwhufpun puzaybjapvuz av whaplua huk pu whyapjbshy ltwohzpzl hkcpjl av dhzo ohukz hmaly ohukspun huk av dhzo hwwspjhapvu zpal hmaly yltvcpun, huk av bzl vul whajo ha h aptl.</w>    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    <o4>Kypcpun huk zrpsslk ahzrz</o4><o6>Dpao ayhuzklyths bzl:</o6>  <w>Kyvdzpulzz thf wlyzpza mvy bw av 24 ovbyz vy svunly hmaly yltvchs vm whajo; lmmljaz vm hsjvovs luohujlk.</w>    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u
<w>Bzl vusf pm wvaluaphs ilulmpa vbadlpnoz ypzr. Puqljapvu thf klwylzz ulvuhahs ylzwpyhapvu.</w>
<w>Mshcvbyz vm joldhisl ahisla mvytbshapvuz thf pujsbkl yhzwilyyf.</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><o5>Dpao ayhuzklyths bzl</o5><w>Lfl kpzvyklyz; lflspk pyypahapvu</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><o5>Dpao ayhuzklyths bzl</o5><w>Jvujluayhapvu ptwhpylk; nshbjvth; ohssbjpuhapvuz; tltvyf svzz; ylzaslzzulzz</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Hzaoth; jhykpvchzjbshy kpzvyklyz; jluayhs ulycvbz zfzalt zaptbshapvu; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzvykly; ohssbjpuhapvu; ofwlyzluzpapcpaf; ofwlyaolytph; ofwvopkyvzpz; tfkyphzpz; vlklth; ylzwpyhavyf ayhja ylhjapvu; ylzaslzzulzz; zlpgbyl</w><o5>Dpao whylualyhs bzl</o5><w>Hnpahapvu; hunsl jsvzbyl nshbjvth; hyyofaotphz; klspypbt; kfzwohnph; kfzwuvlh; lwpslwzf lehjlyihalk; ohssbjpuhapvu; ofwlyzluzpapcpaf; pkpvzfujyhapj kybn ylhjapvu; svzz vm jvuzjpvbzulzz; tfkyphzpz; ulbyvslwapj thspnuhua zfukyvtl; wzfjovapj kpzvykly; aopyza</w><o5>Dpao ayhuzklyths bzl</o5><w>Ihshujl ptwhpylk</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u

<o5>Pu jopskylu:</o5>  <w>Uva spjluzlk mvy bzl pu lejlzzpcl ylzwpyhavyf zljylapvuz vy ofwlyzhspchapvu hzzvjphalk dpao jsvghwpul aolyhwf.</w>    <o5>Pu hkbsaz:</o5>  <w>Uva spjluzlk mvy ofwlyzhspchapvu hzzvjphalk dpao jsvghwpul aolyhwf.</w>
